name: Konkhmer Sleokchher
description: Konkhmer Sleokchher is created and released in 2015 by Suon May Sophanith. It is a modern display Khmer font, inspired by the brush strokes used for writing on walls, but expressed as leaves. With a medium size, it is ideal for use as headings or in large typography. To contribute, see github.com/suonmaysophanith7/KonKhmer_SleokChher .
author: Suon May Sophanith
